tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE teaching_resources (
    resource_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    educator_id UUID,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    resource_name VARCHAR(100),
    created_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE educators (educator_id INT PRIMARY KEY, educator_name VARCHAR(50), specialization VARCHAR(50), teaching_subject VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE teaching_resources (resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY, resource_name VARCHAR(100), resource_type VARCHAR(50), upload_date DATE, educator_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (educator_id) REFERENCES educators(educator_id));

CREATE TABLE LessonPlans (
    lesson_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    educator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (educator_id) REFERENCES Educators(educator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Worksheets (
    worksheet_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    content TEXT,
    educator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (educator_id) REFERENCES Educators(educator_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PresentationMaterials (
    material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    file_url VARCHAR(255),
    educator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (educator_id) REFERENCES Educators(educator_id)
);
